narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant will be licensed as a Class A dealer. Applicant will sent the license fee and a copy of the report to the
Western Regional Office within 20 days to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Bldg B MS3W11
Ft. Collins, CO 80526
No regulated activities may be conducted until the USDA license has been issued.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
